explains: n. 概念，想法；缝纫用品；一时的念头，突发的奇想

sentences.en: She had only a vague notion of what might happen.
sentences.cn: 对于可能发生的事她只有一个模糊的概念。

sentences.en: It might be considered heresy to suggest such a notion.
sentences.cn: 提出这样的见解可能会被认为是异端邪说。

sentences.en: I still believe in the notion of an egalitarian society.
sentences.cn: 我仍然相信平等主义社会的理念。
